name: ClickStream
description:
This is ClickStream!

This game was made for the 8 Bits to Infinity's Time Jam.

Help Streamer get those views! Read the chat to see what they want. Make the right combos to get more views! But be careful! Missing requests will make you lose views!

  • PURPLE cards are GAME related cards.
  • PINK cards are TALK related cards.
  • YELLOW cards are FOOD related cards.
  • GREEN cards are RARE and act like joker cards! Get them to get more views!

Credits:

  • Art by Akijpg
  • Programming by John Matrix/Randoraz
  • Music by Randoraz

Non-Original Assets:

  • Pixeloid Font by GGBot
  • DS-Digital Font by Dusit Supasawat
